title: A little more oil in my lamp Keep it burning, A little more oil in my lamp l pray A little more oil in my lamp Keep it burning, Keep it burning till the break of day. I am oh worrier out in the field, And I can sing and I can shout, And I can tell it all about, That Jesus died for me, When I get over yonder, In that happy paradise, When I get over yonder in the field.
lyrics: A little more oil in my lamp Keep it burning, A little more oil in my lamp l pray A little more oil in my lamp Keep it burning, Keep it burning till the break of day. I am oh worrier out in the field, And I can sing and I can shout, And I can tell it all about, That Jesus died for me, When I get over yonder, In that happy paradise, When I get over yonder in the field.
